img.title: Important Information
img.style: vertical-align: top; left: 144px; top: 66px; width: 624px; height: 148px;

p.style: color: rgb(32, 31, 30); font-family: "Segoe UI", "Segoe UI Web (West European)", "Segoe UI", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 15px;

p.span: This letter is to inform you that an extended learning plan has been developed and will be implemented immediately while school is not in session. Learning will occur virtually at the direction of your student’s teachers. Each subject area teacher will communicate expectations regarding the completion, submission and grading of the assignments on a weekly basis.

RMA students and their families should check their email and class websites periodically for any updated assignments and feedback. Please reach out to your student’s teachers with any questions related to assignments. Thank you for your cooperation and support as our school community moves forward with the responsibility of educating your children during these uncertain times. The health and security of your families is upon our minds and we wish you nothing but the best moving forward.

River Mill Academy is a North Carolina Public Charter School currently serving approximately 850 students in kindergarten through twelfth grade. Our goal is to assist parents in their mission to develop exemplary young citizens with superior academic preparation, equipped with analytical thinking skills, a passion for learning, and a virtuous character, all built upon a solid foundation of knowledge. Our curriculum is challenging and demanding in an age and grade appropriate manner and our standards are high.

Please take some time to explore our webspace features such as the athletic calendar, news sections, teacher webspaces, and quicklinks. Subscribe to our Facebook, Twitter, or RSS feeds to receive updates on school information.

a.title: Limited Quantity of Yearbooks Still Available

div.a: Limited Quantity of Yearbooks Still Available
div.div: We have a limited quantity of 2019-2020 Yearbooks available for purchase. The Middle School/High School Yearbook is $50 and the Elementary School Yearbook is $20. Order your copy online now. Click the "read more" button for links to place your order.
div.a: Read More about Limited Quantity of Yearbooks Still Available

a.title: New Protocols to Limit Spread of COVID-19

div.a: New Protocols to Limit Spread of COVID-19
div.div: River Mill Academy has announced new protocols to help limit the spread of the novel coronavirus COVID-19. The Board approved the changes as state officials have announced the virus has spread to more North Carolina counties.
div.a: Read More about New Protocols to Limit Spread of COVID-19

div.div: All Middle School and High School athletic workouts, practices, and contests for River Mill Academy teams will be suspended after Friday, March 13 through April 6, 2020 or until we are notified by the NCHSAA that we can resume athletic events.
div.a: Read More about Athletic Update - March 13
